member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE
member.summary: The DWRITE_BASELINE enumeration contains values that specify the baseline for text alignment.

member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE.DWRITE_BASELINE_DEFAULT
member.summary: The Roman baseline for horizontal; the Central baseline for vertical.

member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE.DWRITE_BASELINE_ROMAN
member.summary: The baseline that is used by alphabetic scripts such as Latin, Greek, and Cyrillic.

member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE.DWRITE_BASELINE_CENTRAL
member.summary: Central baseline, which is generally used for vertical text.

member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE.DWRITE_BASELINE_MATH
member.summary: Mathematical baseline, which math characters are centered on.

member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE.DWRITE_BASELINE_HANGING
member.summary: Hanging baseline, which is used in scripts like Devanagari.

member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE.DWRITE_BASELINE_IDEOGRAPHIC_BOTTOM
member.summary: Ideographic bottom baseline for CJK, left in vertical.

member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE.DWRITE_BASELINE_IDEOGRAPHIC_TOP
member.summary: Ideographic top baseline for CJK, right in vertical.

member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE.DWRITE_BASELINE_MINIMUM
member.summary: The bottom-most extent in horizontal, left-most in vertical.

member.name: DWRITE_BASELINE.DWRITE_BASELINE_MAXIMUM
member.summary: The top-most extent in horizontal, right-most in vertical.
